Title: October 2019
Content: 15*p62792ra01528*turn over      (b) a change in a single base can cause a change in the amino acid sequence produced in protein synthesis.  (i) name the type of each mutation described below.(2)base number 3 becomes cytosine (c) base number 6 becomes number 5 in the sequence base number 9 becomes number 10 in the sequence   *(ii) explain the possible effects of these three types of mutation on the amino acid sequence coded for by this length of dna.   use the information in the table to support your answer.(6)(total for question 6 = 9 marks)
